title: "Making datras data a little more tidy"
output: 
  html_document: 
    keep_md: yes
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{r}
# devtools::install_github("fishvice/tidyices")
library(tidyices)
library(tidyverse)

yrs <- 2017  # years
qs <- c(1)   # quarters

hh <-
  icesDatras::getDATRAS(record = "HH",
                        survey = "NS-IBTS",
                        years = yrs,
                        quarters = qs) %>%
  tidy_hauls()
glimpse(hh)

hl <-
  icesDatras::getDATRAS(record = "HL",
                        survey = "NS-IBTS",
                        years = yrs,
                        quarters = qs) %>%
  tidy_lengths(hh)
glimpse(hl)

ca <-
  icesDatras::getDATRAS(record = "CA",
                        survey = "NS-IBTS",
                        years = yrs,
                        quarters = qs) %>%
  tidy_ages()
glimpse(ca)
```
